task.summary: Add mockito-core, mockito kotlin and arch components core test dependencies
Update to android gradle plugin 3.4 beta 02
Add hamcrest matchers. Fix basic unit test setup
Modularize project splitting it to app, domain and opentweathermapmodule. This allows us to add one module per weather api we will include.
Update circle ci image to android 28
Improve imports. Disable inline ktlint wildcard import rule
Add Settings Feature to allow changing the temperature unit
Complete Settings Feature. Use temperature unit setting in weather feature to display the temp in celsius or fahrenheit
Add search bar to search for a city Add snackbar on error when fetching weather data for a city Fix detekt issues
Extract margin to dimen folder. Add margin to search bar
Fix WeatherViewModel unit test expected value

MESSAGE.value: Fix detekt issues
Update Android Studio Plugin back to 3.4.0 . Use json annotation to map responses from snake to camel case
Add drawable resources for weather data. Improve models. Add base url and api key to build config. Update gradle and android gradle plugin versions
Add comment to remember to remove the dependency on external service ids and the icon codes
Update gradle to 5.1 and various dependencies Add gradle plugin to check for dependency updates
Add list to show weather data for cities Improve entities Decouple weather id and icon using weather type in domain layer
Add apiKey and apiBaseUrl to gradle.properties
Add mockito-core, mockito kotlin and arch components core test dependencies
Update to android gradle plugin 3.4 beta 02
Add hamcrest matchers. Fix basic unit test setup
Improve domain model
Upgrade android gradle plugin to 3.4.0-beta03
